item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Homebound Lunch Menu: | Vegetar: Økologisk cremet kartoffel suppe med friteret portobello svampe, lyn bagte æbler toppet med hakket purløg | Vegetarian: Organic creamy potato soup with fried portobello mushrooms, quick baked apples topped with chopped chives |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 - Globetrotter Lunch Menu: | Vegetar: Græsk Gyros serveret med krydret aubergine, hertil tzatziki, | peberfrugt kompot, græske fladbrød toppet med frisk oregano | Vegetarian: Greek Gyros served with spicy eggplant, tzatziki, pepper compote, Greek flatbread topped with fresh oregano |

item.title: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB3 - Lunch Menu: | Nordafrikansk tomatiseret ret med stegt æg | Shakshouka med stegt æg, bulgur og friske krydderurter | Dagens kage | ”Klassens time” chokoladekage | North African tomato-based dish with fried egg | Shakshouka with fried egg, bulgur, and fresh herbs. | Cake of the day | “Class Hour” chocolate cake |

item.title: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB2 - Lunch Menu: | Ovnbagt blomkål med cremet muhammara og sprøde kikærter. Fulgt af bagte og syltede løg, tahindressing og friske urter. | Dagens kage: | .Gluten og laktosefri brownie | Mør nakkefilet braiseret i æblemost, rosmarin og timian. Serveres med grov kartoffel- og rodfrugtsmos, intens skysauce og syltede sennepskorn. | Vegetar: . | Grillet spidskål med æble vinaigrette. Serveres med grov kartoffel og rodfrugtsmos og syltede sennepskorn | Oven-baked cauliflower with creamy muhammara and crispy chickpeas. Served with roasted and pickled onions, tahini dressing, and fresh herbs. | Cake of the day: Gluten- and lactose-free brownie. | Tender pork neck braised in apple juice, rosemary, and thyme. Served with rustic mashed potatoes and root vegetables, rich pan sauce, and pickled mustard seeds. | Vegetarian : Grilled pointed cabbage with apple vinaigrette. Served with rustic mashed potatoes and root vegetables, and pickled mustard seeds. |

item.title: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu
item.description: 🍽 HUB1 – Kays - Lunch Menu: | VEGETAR: Græskar suppe med saltet cremefraiche, syltet mango, ristet kerner toppet med kørvel | Gnocchi i cremet franske skovsvampesauce med ristet vand kastanjer hertil langtidsbagte tomater, friteret rødbeder og kørvel | Gnocchi in creamy French forest mushroom sauce with roasted water chestnuts, slow-baked tomatoes, fried beets and chervil |
